de.directionDesc: Endhaltestelle des Busses, Zuges oder Schiffes
de.attention: Zusatzinformationen vorhanden (Umleitung, Gründe für Verspätung usw.)

en.scheduledDesc: time for the departure as stated in the timetable
en.realDesc: currently planned time for the departure (with delays)
en.directionDesc: terminus of this line or train
en.barrierfree: the bus, train or ship is barrier-free
en.attention: there is additional information for this line (detour, reasons for delays etc.)
